Name: The Googol Clicker
About the game: The Googol Clicker is a pure idle clicker game with simple mechanics but truly addictive gameplay. Your goal is to reach the googol value which is 1e100 or one with hundred zeros. That's it! Sounds easy, right? Analyze your actions and upgrades which you want to purchase. Use prestige system wisely. And once you will be able to reach the final goal! Benefits: Addictive gameplay with idle and clicker mechanics Seven stats to upgrade. Nothing unnecessary Prestige system. Reset your progress to reach new heights Stylish minimalistic graphics. Dark and light themes included Track your progress. Want to know how many clicks left to complete the game? Achievable goals. The game can be completed, just find the way If you are tired of idle games overloaded with useless mechanics and infinite goals then The Googol Clicker is your choice. Just try!
